content:
<uink45> re: **@katya_rz**
> Question to the Lantern team: do you have a cli flag activating metrics?
Hi @katya_rz, metrics will be enabled if the flag` --metrics-port `has been specified. In the` lean-quickstart `repo, this flag has been set in Lanternâ€™s command line: 

https://github.com/blockblaz/lean-quickstart/blob/main/client-cmds/lantern-cmd.sh
